0.9.1.name: wordpress/ws-live
0.9.1.description:
Zingiri Web Shop is a Wordpress plugin that turns a great content management system into a fantastic e-commerce solution.

The Live version is a special edition of our standard plugin that uses web services stored on Zingiri's servers. It makes installation a breeze and ensures you are always up to date with the latest versions. Read more in the plugin's FAQ about what that means.

The main features are:

  • Simple installation & easy configuration
  • Sell digital and physical products
  • Full customer management module
  • Complete ordering and stock management module
  • Ajax powered shopping cart & one page checkout
  • Support for payment portals like Paypal, Worldpay, Google Checkout and iDEAL and possibility to add your own
  • Multiple language libraries included: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Danish, Estonian, Finish, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russi
